name: Bot War
description: Bot War is a single-player FPS played between three teams. The game contains many features not found in other games, such as a spherical planet, innovative player controls, a sophisticated energy system, bullets you can see and hear as they fly through the air, and AI that can be rewritten.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Core i7-920 Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 Storage: 258 MB available space Additional Notes: Java 8
